      • traverseAndFilter

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> traverseAndFilter(java.util.regex.Pattern regexPattern,
                                                           java.io.File node,
                                                           boolean isAbsolute,
                                                           boolean onlyDirectories)
        Traverses a given File node and returns a list of absolute path that match the given regexPattern.

        Assumptions: - ignores files and folders that we do not have access to (insufficient read permissions) - regexPattern should not be null

        Parameters:
        regexPattern - Pattern object
        node - File object
        isAbsolute - Boolean option to indicate that the regexPattern refers to an absolute path
        onlyDirectories - Boolean option to list only the directories
